'''Eremitis ne credite''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Through the Predawn Night}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement means "do not trust the [[Eremites]]" in Latin. It is likely a reference to the famous quote "equo ne credite, Teucri!", which means "do not trust the horse, Trojans!"
